Get Started

Source: vignettes/report.Rmd
report.Rmd

Installation

First, install R and R studio. Then, copy and paste the following lines in the console:

install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("easystats/report") # You only need to do that once
library("report") # Load the package every time you start R

Great! The report package is now installed and loaded in your session.

Examples

The report package works in a two step fashion. First, you create a report object with the report() function. Then, this report object can be displayed either textually (the default output) or as a table, using as.data.frame(). Moreover, you can also access a more compact version of the report using summary() on the report object.
